scripts.build-software-terms: cat source-files.txt | xargs cspell-tools-cli compile --split --no-compress -o ./dict -M softwareTerms.txt
scripts.build-networking-terms: cat source-files-networking.txt | xargs cspell-tools-cli compile --split --no-compress -o ./dict -M networkingTerms.txt
scripts.build: npm run build-software-terms && npm run build-networking-terms
scripts.test: npm run test-software-terms && npm run test-networking-terms
scripts.test-networking-terms: cat source-files-networking.txt | xargs cat | cspell -v "--local=*" "--languageId=*" stdin
